name: Parkour Game
description:
Parkour Game is fun Parkour game where you can Parkour in a cool world and find the secrets of the World.
In Parkour Game you can jump like superhero and you can find hidden things around the maps.

Features:

  • Cool sound track
  • +5 Unique Parkour Maps
  • Jumping
  • Realistic Controls

Controls:

  • WASD=Movement
  • ESCAPE=MainMenu
  • Space=Jump
